articles.description: University of Melbourne research into epigenetics is revealing how the effects of contracting an infection can be passed on to your children through your DNA.

The influence of parents on the lives of their children is complex. 
Before we are born this influence is reduced to what can be inherited through egg and sperm. While the inheritance of genes shapes our physical features and predisposition to disease, it is… [+5852 chars]

articles.author: Sharri Markson and Clare Armstrong
articles.title: Wuhan lab virus leak fears raised in early February - Daily Mercury
articles.description: Advice to the Morrison government as early as February suggested that COVID-19 may have been an inadvertent leak from a Wuhan laboratory.
articles.content:
Advice to the Morrison government as early as February suggested that COVID-19 may have been an inadvertent leak from a Wuhan laboratory, three senior federal sources have confirmed.
The Daily Telegraph can reveal in the early days of the outbreak the probab… [+2460 chars]
